title: When mods get their mod card

replies.body: Gold worth gif, well played.
Gold? This shit is at least Diamond level. Some would even say it's worth Masters.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8vFXBiTu,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-04-24T15:52:58.919+0000)
>
> Gold? This shit is at least Diamond level. Some would even say it's worth Masters.

Challenger.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8vFXBiTu,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-04-24T15:52:58.919+0000)
>
> Gold? This shit is at least Diamond level. Some would even say it's worth Masters.

This is not what I mean {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Yes it is.

Just a heads up, this would work better if you link directly to the gif instead of to the imgur page. As it is, the gif is tiny and has a lot of whitespace. To link more directly, just follow the link, right click the image, and click "Copy Video Address". Then paste this URL to the boards. 

Since it ends in .mp4, just change it to .gif and add [/img] and it will work perfectly. Like so:

~~https://i.imgur.com/N4cMatZ.gif[/img]~~

Which looks like:
https://i.imgur.com/N4cMatZ.gif[/img]


---------


You can find more tips on posting gifs on the boards in the [User Guide: Posting Images and Gifs on the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/LwiE97JE-user-guide-posting-images-and-gifs-on-the-boards)
Oh shit you're a specialist now? Big boi on the block lul
https://i.imgur.com/p6oVMOc.jpg[/img]

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=8vFXBiTu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-24T04:06:33.167+0000)
>
> Just a heads up, this would work better if you link directly to the gif instead of to the imgur page. As it is, the gif is tiny and has a lot of whitespace. To link more directly, just follow the link, right click the image, and click "Copy Video Address". Then paste this URL to the boards. 
> 
> Since it ends in .mp4, just change it to .gif and add [/img] and it will work perfectly. Like so:
> 
> ~~https://i.imgur.com/N4cMatZ.gif[/img]~~
> 
> Which looks like:
> https://i.imgur.com/N4cMatZ.gif[/img]
> 
> 
> ---------
> 
> 
> You can find more tips on posting gifs on the boards in the [User Guide: Posting Images and Gifs on the Boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/LwiE97JE-user-guide-posting-images-and-gifs-on-the-boards)

Thanks, sorry, forgot the [].

Actually I started with a Giphy link first (with a [text link](http etc.) to the pure gif on Imgur) because Imgur only allows 30 seconds for videos (unlimited for actual gifs), but then I saw that Giphy only allows 15 seconds but doesn't actually say that anywhere and just silently truncates to 15, so I edited and stripped it down to just the Imgur link. That's when I forgot to add the [], as Giphy links don't require that and my original link to the Imgur version didn't need it because it wasn't trying to render it.

Actually actually, when I made the edit and then refreshed, it simply showed the gif properly, so I thought nothing more of it. Refreshed again after seeing your reply and it was wonky.
Oof, I know that feel. I have done that more times then I care to count. The boards ain't exactly user friendly lol

Ok wait, i'm gone for a month and you got made specialist?

The fuck?

What do you specialize in other than golden shitposting? 

did you seriously get 'meme specialist'?
Ok man as a Mod I have to say.....this is freaking hilarious. ILL BAN YOU SHORTLY SIR. Gosh darn it. :D
THIS IS AMAZINNNNG XD
Entire Mod team just here to say GG I guess.
currently? pretty much

OMG the layers in that narrative.
Dude, well done. Comedy gold

It's funny because it's true.

take a +1
